Activity: Check emails and respond to any outstanding inquiries related to the needs assessment or training program.
Continue reviewing responses to the needs assessment questionnaire. Categorize the responses to identify key training needs and priorities.
Meet with @da-1 and @da-2 to discuss the data analysis requirements for the influenza trend analysis project. Understand the specific data elements that need to be collected and analyzed.
Refine the learning objectives based on the meeting with @da-1 and @da-2. Incorporate objectives related to data analysis and interpretation.
Review the staff list again. Cross-reference the list with department schedules to determine the best times for training sessions.
Lunch break. Read a book about communication skills.
Begin developing a training outline based on the learning objectives. Identify the key topics and concepts that need to be covered in the training program.
Contact @itpm-1 to discuss the logistical aspects of the training program, such as room booking, equipment availability, and IT support.

Continue working on the training outline. Identify potential training methods and activities that can be used to engage participants and facilitate learning (e.g., lectures, demonstrations, hands-on exercises).
Finalize the list of staff members involved in data collection. Document all names, roles, and contact information in a centralized database.
